vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with LPA, Inc. for architectural, design, engineering, bid advertisement, construction administration and warranty support services for renovation and expansion of Preston Royal Branch Library located at 5626 Royal Lane - Not to exceed $1,041,500.00 - Financing: Library Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund)
